thread.title: Paris attack suspect jailed over police shootout

title: Paris attack suspect jailed over police shootout
text:
Paris attack suspect jailed over police shootout 11:58am BST - 00:52 
Salah Abdeslam, the main surviving suspect from in the 2015 Paris attacks, has been found guilty of attempted murder in a separate case relating to a police shootout. David Doyle reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Salah Abdeslam, the main surviving suspect from in the 2015 Paris attacks, has been found guilty of attempted murder in a separate case relating to a police shootout. David Doyle reports.
